name: Frog Cheese - Not So Alive Frogs
name_original: Frog Cheese - Not So Alive Frogs
description:
Progress baby

Arrows to move, Z to shoot/talk

Just don't get hit and kill defeat that arsonist Keroka

Used Unity, BoscaCeoil, jsfxr and Krita

This is the 2nd game of Frog Cheese, progress is boomin.

Even added some lore(holy it's going intense)

Some Context:

You Play as John. Keroka the undead frog burned your house when you were shopping. Now you seek revenge and go to her seaside to visit her.
